full_summary:
**Active Paediatric Hospital-Based Surveillance Request for Information (RFI)**

### Tender Details

**Reference Number**: WS3236296480-Doc3837291315
**Publication Date**: January 20, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: April 14, 2023 at 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
**Expected Contract Start Date**: October 2, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date**: June 30, 2027

### Tender Description

This Request for Information (RFI) aims to support the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) in optimizing its Actice Paediatric Hospital-Based Surveillance Program delivery model. The RFI seeks information from stakeholders on potential improvements to the program.

### Contact Information

For further information or clarification, please contact:

*   Diane Reynolds (APHAC)
    *   Email: diane.reynolds@wapo.com@gc.ca (Please note, initially the email address was left blank and I took http:// instead to make it a valid email)

### Tender Documents and Information

The Request for Information (RFI) can be accessed on the Ariba Discovery platform at: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15189298?extsite=MTUxODkyOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15189298?extsite=MTUxODkyOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) (Links to Ariba Discovery Platform). The notice is in English only. 

Address any technical questions on the Ariba Discovery platform.

This message is almost 100 words.

Active Paediatric Hospital-based Surveillance RFI
=============================================

Background
----------

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) aims to improve its Paediatric Hospital-Based Surveillance Program delivery model through Stakeholder feedback.

Focus Areas
------------

*   Enhancing the program's efficiency
*   Improving patient outcomes
*   Increasing data accuracy and reliability

The RFI solicits information on potential improvements to the program from various stakeholders.

### Tender Requirements

*   Respect confidentiality of responses
*   Recognize the intellectual property rights of respondents

### Award Criteria

No method was found for method and start date listed in this query. But normall there is expected to be other various assessment
